resources.string: Coffee Shop
Hello blank fragment
Coffee Shop
Welcome to Coffee Shop
Hot Latte is a concoction of hard brewed espresso with sweetened milk and milk foam to top it up
A Mocha Latte is simply a coffee latte with the addition of chocolate. The flavors of the coffee and chocolate meld almost seamlessly
A Pumpkin spice latte contains 2% milk, two shots of espresso, four pumps of pumpkin spice sauce and whipped cream on top
A Vanilla latte is a beverage made with â…“ espresso and 2/3 steamed milk, with a little bit of fine foam and the addition of vanilla syrup
A Caramel Latte is made by mixing espresso with caramel syrup and pouring steamed milk on top
Coffee Mocha is a shot of espresso combined with a chocolate powder or syrup, followed by milk or cream
Hot chocolate is a thick beverage made of melted, solid chocolate blended with milk, cream, or water
French Vanilla Coffee is created from our own unique blend of 100% Arabic beans and a hint of French Vanilla sweetness
Steeping a tea bag is the process of extracting the bioactive compounds and flavor from tea solids
White Hot Chocolate is made using white chocolate mocha sauce, 2% milk and foam and topped with whipped cream
Lemonade is a sweetened beverage made from lemons, sugar, and water
A Iced Caramel Latte is a sweetened beverage made from coffee, caramel sauce (or salted caramel), milk of your choice, and ice
A Hazelnut Cold Brew is prepared by steeping roasted, ground, 100% Arabia coffee beans in filtered cool water, this delightful cold brew has a hint of hazelnut flavour
Pumpkin spice Iced lattes consist of espresso, milk, pumpkin puree, pumpkin pie spice, sweetener, vanilla extract, and ice
A Peach Quencher is blend with peaches pineapple juice and lemonade concentrate top with club soda
Vanilla Cold Brew coffee accented with vanilla and topped with a delicate float of house-made vanilla sweet cream that cascades throughout the cup
Soft yeast-filled donut dipped in maple fondant with rich venetian cream filling
Boston Cream Donut is made with homemade doughnuts filled with a smooth vanilla pastry cream filling and topped with a rich chocolate glaze
A Vanilla filling topped with a drizzle of chocolate syrup and a dusting of white donut sugar
a Mix of maple, brown sugar, and whole wheat flour, dipped in a sweet brown butter glaze flavored with real maple syrup and vanilla
A super simple yeasted sweet dough made with a mix of flour, eggs, milk, yeast, salt, and lightly sweetened with honey
Plain bagel is more than a baked ring of dough, crisp on the outside, chewy on the inside, slightly sweet, somewhat salty, undeniably pristine
Four Cheese Bagel made with a blend of real cheddar, mozzarella, asiago, and parmesan, for a delicious meal full of cheesy flavour
12 Grain Bagels make a delicious snack or meal any time of day. Made with whole grain whole-wheat flour including the sunflower seeds and poppy seeds
The bagel underneath the everything topping is just a plain bagel, transformed by the addition of a spice mix right before baked
Jalapeno Bagel is prepared when powdered or crushed jalapeno peppers are used to flavour cream cheese slabs or spreads
Blueberry Muffin is a variation of the plain muffin and is made from fresh or frozen blueberries, flour, baking powder, milk, egg, butter, sugar, salt and seasonings
Walnut muffins are made from scratch with simple ingredients. These muffins are soft, moist, and filled with cinnamon and walnuts
Chocolate muffins are a type of baked good built around one or several varieties of chocolate. These are usually sweet rather than savory
Fruit muffins are moist, tender, and buttery with lots of fresh fruit inside to balance out the sweetness of the muffin
